name: 3x3 mini-Shogi
description: This video game is creating to referencing to Japanese traditional board game "Shogi". Shogi is a game very similar to chess. You choose 3 pieces and play 3 times for play on board of 9 squares with limited pieces. You don't need to know how to move the pieces. This game will guide you.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP (SP3) Processor: Intel Celeron Memory: 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0b Storage: 8 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64bit Processor: Intel CORE i7 Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 32 MB available space
